q_en: The expected completion date for cutting task 33 needs to be extended to July 31, 2024.

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Expert Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named 'Expert Cutters'

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET end_time = '2024-07-31' WHERE working_group_id = 4;
steps.description: Update the end time of cutting tasks for the working group 'Expert Cutters' to July 31, 2024
